error_reset_0: Your home screen was reset because of a fatal error :( Please report this:
error_too_long: System took too long to launch

alert_uninstall.title: Uninstall this app?
alert_uninstall.message: This app, plus any information it contains, will be deleted from your device.

reset_launcher.title: Reset Groove Launcher?
reset_launcher.message: This will reset your launcher to its default settings. All customizations will be lost.

root_fail.title: Root Access Required
root_fail.message: Root access is required to perform this action. Please grant root access to continue.

shizuku_fail.title: Shizuku Permission Required
shizuku_fail.message: Shizuku permission is required to perform this action. Please grant Shizuku permission to continue.

groove_settings.title: Settings
groove_settings.friendly_accent_color_text: Change your device's background andaccent color tomatch your mood today, this week, or all month.
groove_settings.friendly_tile_text: You can change the size and number of tiles available on your home screen.
